title: Who is the best Latin singer, Ricky Martin or Enrique Iglesias? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sincerily , no one . I don´t like their songs , they both do plastic music / mainstream . To me is so sad that this type of artist along Shakira represent Latin music (+ reggaeton), I respect them , they worked hard and so good for them that are world wide artist ,but I think there are other most talented and great latin artist that deserve more recognition
